title: Toss A Coin (Wear)
summary: FREE Toss A Coin app with realistic animation now on your Android Wear watch!
description: Ever needed to make a quick and maybe hard decision? Then Toss A Coin is the app for you. It's just a simple coin flipping application, but can come in handy on lots of occasions.Me and my friends used it for example, for deciding who got the last cookie!Toss A Coin is a totally free application, no advertisement or anything! On top of that this app has a really cool animation, which looks like a real coin and spins with easy on the eye. Now impress your friends by just shaking your wrist and the coin on your watch starts flipping!Now go and Toss it, Flip it, Spin it, Catch it and get Heads or Tails!Features:- Totally free, no ads- Completely random (no cheating possible)- Realistic animation- Support of round and square smartwatches- Coin adjusts to the screen size of your smartwatch- Start flipping a coin by shaking wrist or tapping the screenTo be added soon:- More coins- Phone and tablet version- Voice commandsCurrently supported Android Wear watches:- Motorola Moto 360- LG G Watch- LG G Watch R- Sony SmartWatch 3- Asus ZenWatch- Samsung Gear Live
descriptionHTML:
Ever needed to make a quick and maybe hard decision? Then Toss A Coin is the app for you. It's just a simple coin flipping application, but can come in handy on lots of occasions.
Me and my friends used it for example, for deciding who got the last cookie!

Toss A Coin is a totally free application, no advertisement or anything! On top of that this app has a really cool animation, which looks like a real coin and spins with easy on the eye. Now impress your friends by just shaking your wrist and the coin on your watch starts flipping!

Now go and Toss it, Flip it, Spin it, Catch it and get Heads or Tails!

Features:
- Totally free, no ads
- Completely random (no cheating possible)
- Realistic animation
- Support of round and square smartwatches
- Coin adjusts to the screen size of your smartwatch
- Start flipping a coin by shaking wrist or tapping the screen

To be added soon:
- More coins
- Phone and tablet version
- Voice commands

Currently supported Android Wear watches:
- Motorola Moto 360
- LG G Watch
- LG G Watch R
- Sony SmartWatch 3
- Asus ZenWatch
- Samsung Gear Live
comments: It is beautiful but i am having problems with it Tried it on Moto360 on android 5.0.1(maybe why there is problems) It take longer than expected to load and crashes sometimes when i open it. Also the background of the text is black not transparent which hide the coin.  Update: thanks for the quick reply and fix. And it will be awesome if you make a phone app to go with it and more coins.
Simple yet great Simple application, but works great and comes in handy... A must-have on your smartwatch!
Goed, enkel iets te weinig willekeurigheid Deze app is interessant en gebruikzaam, maar enkel iets te voorspelbaar.
